title: Trump Eyes Aussie Retirement Model as a Possible Fix for US
description: Looking overseas for fresh ideas, President Trump says his team is studying Australia's retirement savings program as a possible model for revamping how Americans prepare for their later years. Trump said Australia's "superannuation" system—requiring employer…
content: The system, established with 3% contributions in 1992, has grown into the world's fourth-largest retirement savings pool (about $3 trillion), though Australia is 55th in the world in terms of populat… [+1048 chars]
